xAOD::BTagVertex

xAOD::BTagVertex Class Reference

Class for xAOD secondary vertex finding information (main client: JetFitter) that is too much overhead for the xAOD::Vertex. More...

#include <BTagVertex_v1.h>

Detailed Description

Class for xAOD secondary vertex finding information (main client: JetFitter) that is too much overhead for the xAOD::Vertex.
